item.title: Git
item.author: serialt
item.description: Git 一、git基本使用 1、commit [root@node01 project]# git add 1.txt [root@node01 project]# git commit -m "create new 1.txt" [master (root-commit) 3e8ce87] create new 1.txt 1 file changed, 0 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-) create mode 100644 1.txt 2、diff文件 [root@node01 project]# git diff 1.txt diff --git a/1.txt b/1.txt index e69de29..21d56a0 100644 --- a/1.txt
